#include<stdio.h>
#include<math.h>
#include <iostream>
#include<algorithm>
using namespace std;


int main(void) {
int t;
long long int n;
scanf("%d",&t);
while(t--)
{
	scanf("%lld",&n);
	double a,b;
	a=sqrt(5*n*n+4);
	b=sqrt(5*n*n-4);
	if((a-(long long int)a)==0 || (b-(long long int)b)==0)
	printf("Yes\n");
	else
	printf("No\n");
	
   }
return 0;
}
